ch.supertomcat.bh.settings

Class SettingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.supertomcat.bh.settings.SettingsManager

  • public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which handels the settings There are also methods to get hoster-classes the possibility to save their own settings.
